text: Not sure if people here are aware of this open-access optimization journal, but they have a first-rate editorial board and I received word today that they would very much welcome high-quality submissions. From the look of it, they also publish implementation papers. <https://ojmo.centre-mersenne.org/>

elements.text: Not sure if people here are aware of this open-access optimization journal, but they have a first-rate editorial board and I received word today that they would very much welcome high-quality submissions. From the look of it, they also publish implementation papers.

text: I have been aware of this journal for six months or more. The editorial board is excellent.
